name: Power Jump
description:
How far can you go?

Jump on restless rockets through the clouds and challenge your friends!
Can you get an unattainable score? Discover it now!

How to Play:
- Hold your finger on screen and release to jump. 
- Tap on the screen when jumping to get the little nosy bird out!

Game Features:
- Compare your score with others with Google Play Services
- Advertising appears in this game.
- A network connection is NOT required to play.
- Casual game suitable for subway time!

Enjoy!
